Product.Title: Boat Rockerz 103 Pro

PopularityAndTrends.Popularity: Popular among the younger and budget-conscious due to trendy designs and strong bass.
PopularityAndTrends.Trends: Extensive range of wireless earphones with vibrant designs and bass-heavy sound.

UserDemographicsAndPreferences.Demographics: Attracts a younger audience, fashionable, and affordable.
UserDemographicsAndPreferences.Preferences: Stylish designs, strong bass, and wireless features.

Celebrities: Cricketers: Jemimah Rodrigues, Hardik Pandya, KL Rahul, Shreyas Iyer
